snippet: Francine Wheeler, her husband, David, by her side, offered a sorrowful plea for passage of stricter gun control laws.
abstract: Francine Wheeler, mother of child killed in school shooting in Newtown, Conn, delivers White House weekly address, in place of Pres Obama; gives sorrowful plea for Senate to pass gun control legislation.
lead_paragraph: Francine Wheeler, her husband, David, by her side, offered a sorrowful plea for passage of stricter gun control laws.

headline.seo: Mother of Newtown Victim Gives White House’s Weekly Address
headline.main: Mother of a 6-Year-Old Boy Killed at Newtown Delivers the White House’s Weekly Address
headline.print_headline: Mother of a 6-Year-Old Boy Killed at Newtown Delivers the White House’s Weekly Address
